Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package cri-tools for versions less than 1.28.0-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-44487 affecting package cri-tools for versions less than 1.28.0-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package cri-tools is earlier than 1.28.0-2, affected by CVE-2023-44487
